channel.title: CVE Feed for Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark

item.title: CVE-2023-0412|2024-08-02T05:10:55.753Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: TIPC dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0416|2024-08-02T05:10:55.762Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: GNW dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-1161|2024-08-02T05:40:58.008Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: ISO 15765 and ISO 10681 dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.11 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0666|2024-08-02T05:17:50.337Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted RTPS packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, by default, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the context of the process running Wireshark.

item.title: CVE-2023-0414|2024-08-02T05:10:56.038Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Crash in the EAP dissector in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0411|2024-08-02T05:10:55.910Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Excessive loops in multiple dissectors in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0667|2024-08-02T05:17:50.329Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted MSMMS packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, in an unusual configuration, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the context of the process running Wireshark

item.title: CVE-2023-0668|2024-08-02T05:17:50.341Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted IEEE-C37.118 packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, by default, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the context of the process running Wireshark.

item.title: CVE-2023-0413|2024-08-02T05:10:55.913Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Dissection engine bug in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0415|2024-08-02T05:10:55.974Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: iSCSI dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2023-0417|2024-08-02T05:10:56.039Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Memory leak in the NFS dissector in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 and allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
